findings.liver: Heterogeneous and echogenic parenchyma, smooth contour. Evaluation for focal masses limited due to heterogeneous liver parenchyma.
findings.bile_ducts: No intrahepatic biliary dilation; CBD measures 3 mm.
findings.gallbladder: No evidence of stones or gallbladder wall thickening.
findings.pancreas: Imaged portion appears within normal limits without masses or pancreatic ductal dilation.
findings.kidneys: Right kidney measures 11.6 cm with a 2.6 x 2.7 x 2.4 cm simple cyst in the right upper pole.
